name: Porzelfant
description:
Made by a team of two in a little more than 48 hours.

In German we don't say "Like a bull in a china shop". We say "Like an elephant in a china shop". You are the shopkeeper of said china shop trying to prevent the elephant in the room from breaking your precious porcelain. Enjoy!

Clear the way by clicking on the screen.

Theme: "Wohin du mich führst / Where you guide me"

✔ Challenge 1: Alles ist zerbrechlich. / Everything is fragile.

✔ Challenge 2: Wir spielen nicht den Hauptcharakter. / We don't play as the main character.

✖ Challenge 3: Im Spiel lassen sich die Gesetze der Physik brechen. / Break the rules of physics in-game.

✖ Challenge 4: Das Spiel enthält ein Easter Egg. / There's an easter egg in the game.

Music and sound effects: Pixabay

Game Assets: Lisa (L34NDR4)

Code: David
